Functions
getXTicks
function getXTicks(
start,
stop,
amount
)

Function evaluating how to evenly divide the space on the x-axis for the ticks.

Parameters
{Number} start

the start of the x axis

{Number} stop

the end of the x axis

{Number} amount

number of ticks
